name: Krovik File Store Bot
description: File sharing bot that stores posts and allows access via special links

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot token, Get it from @Botfather

OWNER_ID.description: An integer of consisting of your owner ID

APP_ID.description: Your app id, take it from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Your api hash, take it from my.telegram.org

CHANNEL_ID.description: Make a channel (database channel), then make the bot as admin, and put its ID

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL.description: ID of the channel or group for force sub feature, else put 0

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL2.description: ID of the channel or group for second force sub feature, else put 0

ADMINS.description: A space-separated list of user_ids of Admins, they can only create links
